data.label: SQL Inner Join Example
data.value:
Select T.ID
From SESSION S
INNER JOIN AGENT A ON S.Agent_Fk = A.Pk
INNER JOIN PROFILE P On P.Pk = S.Profile_Fk
WHERE S.Active AND P.Pk = 123456

data.label: Bash For Loop Example
data.value:
#!/bin/bash

COUNTER=0
while [  $COUNTER -lt 10 ]; do
  echo The counter is $COUNTER
let COUNTER=COUNTER+1
done
